about_the_game:
This demo includes all the features of the final game, except the shop level is capped at level 5.

In the full version, you can enjoy:

  • Additional aquariums and decorations

  • Saltwater fishes and corals

  • Expanded shop capabilities

  • A storage room

  • Helpers to assist with duties like checkout, restocking, and customer service
detailed_description:
This demo includes all the features of the final game, except the shop level is capped at level 5.

In the full version, you can enjoy:

  • Helpers to assist with duties like checkout, restocking, and customer service
name: Fish Shop Simulator Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3550
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Russian
